A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There was no character progression in this movie. Alot of key events just happen because \"reasons\" wheras alot of very obvious stuff is spelled out and re-iterated in painfully boring detail. The great villian lord Snoke or whatever was given no backstory and his death was very anti-climactic. I could go on at a greater length\, but realizing what this series has sunk down to is just too painful and I rather forget. Needless to say I am donw with this.
